description.displayText: Daniella was great with our kids (ages 3 and 8). She was especially patient with our 3 year old Autistic daughter who at times demands more attention. She kept the kids entertained with board games. She is extremely reliable and always arrives on time. I definitely recommend her as a sitter to other families.
description.originalText: Daniella was great with our kids (ages 3 and 8). She was especially patient with our 3 year old Autistic daughter who at times demands more attention. She kept the kids entertained with board games. She is extremely reliable and always arrives on time. I definitely recommend her as a sitter to other families.

description.displayText: I've known Daniella since she was a baby and she has watched my own children. She is responsible and very good with children, looking after their every need. If she lived closer she would be watching my kids more often.
description.originalText: I've known Daniella since she was a baby and she has watched my own children. She is responsible and very good with children, looking after their every need. If she lived closer she would be watching my kids more often.

description.displayText: Danielle is a very sweet, patient and a responsible young lady. She babysits for my three young children and they adore her!!  She plays fun games, reads to them and prepares their  meals. I highly recommend Daniella.
description.originalText: Danielle is a very sweet, patient and a responsible young lady. She babysits for my three young children and they adore her!!  She plays fun games, reads to them and prepares their  meals. I highly recommend Daniella.

description.displayText: Daniella is incredibly responsible and trustworthy. On time for Daniella means early. She was able to make easy dinners for the kids and she always cleaned up after, even when she was told she didn't have to. She engaged the kids and actively played with them. She let them know the expectations without being mean or a pushover. They ADORE her. She was comfortable with our dog, who also loved her. Daniella is a rare find these days-fun, smart, responsible, athletic, with high values and amazing character. She lived in our neighborhood and made a point to say hello to our kids when she saw them; she made them feel special and loved. She set a great example for them even when she wasn't "working." She has set the bar incredibly high and we're worried we may never find a sitter as good as her again! I recommend her as highly as I can and would hire her again in a heartbeat.
